mementos.effect_cn: 我的攻击性增强。
mementos.effect_en: My aggression is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 代代相传的刀刃，因珍视使用而磨砺。
mementos.lore_en: An heirloom, worn from honest use.
mementos.note: 增加10%攻击性。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的力量增强。
mementos.effect_en: My strength is increased.
mementos.lore_c极: 领袖通过无私的奉献赋予子民力量，暴君的压迫却永远无法激发这般潜能。
mementos.lore_en: A leader lends strength to men the way a tyrant never could.
mementos.note: 增加10%能量。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的速度提升。
mementos.effect_en: My speed is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 有翼之神遭凡人斩击，残翼难支，踉跄遁去。
mementos.lore_en: The winged god, cut down by men, could only hobble away.
mementos.note: 增加10%速度

mementos.effect_cn: 我的机动性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My mobility is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 我追逐飘零的秋叶，却总被其迅捷所欺。
mementos.lore_en: I spend hours trying to catch these leaves as they fall. They're usually too quick for me.
mementos.note: 增加10%机动性。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的感知增幅。
mementos.effect_en: My perception is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 双瞳重明，天地尽览！
mementos.lore_en: I can see again!

mementos.effect_cn: 我的血量增加。
mementos.effect_en: I am healthier.
mementos.lore_cn: 心火不灭，生生不息。
mementos.lore_en: The center of life.
mementos.note: 增加20点最大生命值。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的攻击力增加了。
mementos.effect_en: My stamina is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 一件传家宝，因长久使用而磨损。
mementos.lore_en: Just what I need to keep going.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的坚韧力提升。
mementos.effect_en: My fortitude is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 乱世中激励士气、凝聚部队的象征。
mementos.lore_en: A symbol of inspiration and solidarity amongst the chaos.
mementos.note: 获得+10%坚韧，同时+1激增容量。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的知识增加。
mementos.effect_en: My knowledge is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 沙粒以精准的节奏丈量求知之路。
mementos.lore_en: The sands measure my studies in perfect intervals.
mementos.note: 增加10%知识

mementos.effect_cn: 我对劈砍攻击的抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to slashing attacks is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 血肉之躯的最后防线。
mementos.lore_en: The last argument of flesh.

mementos.effect_cn: 我对穿刺攻击的抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to piercing attacks is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 抵御箭矢贯穿的首选护甲。
mementos.lore_en: Armor of choice to blunt the pierce of arrows.

mementos.effect_cn: 钝器抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: Increased bludgeoning resistance.
mementos.lore_cn: 缓冲钝器重击的柔软屏障。
mementos.lore_en: Softens the blow from bludgeoning weapons.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的魔法抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to magic is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 魔法的反射性被严重夸大。
mementos.lore_en: The reflectiveness of magic is highly exaggerated.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的火焰抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to fire is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 火势太猛……已无力回天。
mementos.lore_en: The flames were too much... Nothing could be done.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的寒冰抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to ice is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 一杯暖茶总能驱散刺骨寒意。
mementos.lore_en: A warm cup of tea always kept the cold at bay.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的雷电抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to electricity is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 若执此物踏入雷暴，至少需做些防备。
mementos.lore_en: If I am to enter the storm with this, I should at least take some precautions.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的毒素抗性提升。
mementos.effect_en: My resistance to poison is increased.
mementos.lore_cn: 懦夫之器，形色万千。
mementos.lore_en: The coward's weapon comes in many forms.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的流血速度减缓。
mementos.effect_en: I bleed out slower.
mementos.lore_cn: 止血……我尚未终结。
mementos.lore_en: Stanch the bleeding... I am not done yet.
mementos.note: 殉道者开局携带4个。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的生命流失减缓。
mementos.effect_en: My health depletes slower.
mementos.lore_cn: 咬住它。能暂缓痛楚。现在开始干活吧。
mementos.lore_en: Bite this. It will delay the pain. Now let's get to work.
mementos.note: 影响黄色可恢复的生命值。

mementos.effect_cn: 恢复生命时可能额外获得护甲。
mementos.effect_en: Whenever I recover health I may also find myself with some extra armor.
mementos.lore_cn: 我的皮肤！正在石化！快停止治疗！
mementos.lore_en: My skin! My skin is turning to stone! Stop the treatment!

mementos.effect_cn: 进入新区域时自我治疗并恢复少量生命。
mementos.effect_en: I patch myself up and regain a little health whenever I enter a new area.
mementos.lore_cn: 绝不能忘！每隔几里我就停下包扎自己。
mementos.lore_en: Can't forget this! I'll stop every few miles and patch myself up.
mementos.note: 恢复10%最大生命值。

mementos.effect_cn: 吞噬心脏恢复生命时可能获得双倍效果。
mementos.effect_en: Recovering my health by consuming hearts may have double the effect.
mementos.lore_cn: 我虽非医者，但料想这意味着她能活两倍之久。
mementos.lore_en: I am no doctor, but I assume this means that she will live twice as long.

mementos.effect_cn: 生命越低我越危险，生命越高我越虚弱。
mementos.effect_en: I become more dangerous when my health decreases and weaker as it increases.
mementos.lore_cn: 负伤困兽，鼠辈尤凶。
mementos.lore_en: When wounded and cornered, the vermin became even more aggressive.
mementos.note: 殉道者开局携带3个。

mementos.effect_cn: 我随着最大生命值降低变得更危险，随着其增加而变弱。
mementos.effect_en: I become more dangerous as my maximum health decreases and weaker as it increases.
mementos.lore_cn: 累累旧伤愈合不良，既已无物可失，鼠辈便无所保留。
mementos.lore_en: Riddled with a lifetime of wounds poorly healed, with little left to lose, the vermin held nothing back.
mementos.note: 造成的伤害与最大生命值成反比

mementos.effect_cn: 我越健康，我的攻击造成的伤害和力量就越大。但当我的生命值低时，我会变得更弱。
mementos.effect_en: The healthier I am, the more damage and power my attacks will hit with. But I become weaker when my health is low.
mementos.lore_cn: 众人皆为无敌英雄欢呼。我只见一个健壮青年，能把我撕成两半。
mementos.lore_en: Everybody is cheering for our invincible hero. All I see is a healthy young man who could break me in half.
mementos.note: 根据当前生命值百分比动态调整伤害值：生命值高时伤害增加，生命值低时伤害减少。

mementos.effect_cn: 取消我的濒死状态并获得喘息之机。
mementos.effect_en: My impending death is cancelled and I am given a second wind.
mementos.lore_cn: 生命之磅礴壮丽，凝于这枚纤弱易碎的卵中。
mementos.lore_en: The profound magnificence of life, embodied in this tiny, delicate egg.

mementos.effect_cn: 生命健康时，我的武器会发射魔法子弹。
mementos.effect_en: My weapons fire magic bullets when I am healthy.
mementos.lore_cn: 以金餐叉铸造而成。
mementos.lore_en: Constructed of golden forks.

mementos.effect_cn: 当生命值恢复至常规限制以上时将获得护甲。
mementos.effect_en: Restoring my health beyond its normal limitations will grant me armor.
mementos.lore_cn: 天使身着神佑金属，细微划痕瞬间愈合，纯粹之美非凡人可承。
mementos.lore_en: It truly is an angel. Adorned in blessed metals that mend any scratch. Sincerely beautiful. I will not survive this.
mementos.note: 当治疗超过生命上限时，获得一些护甲。

mementos.effect_cn: 治疗增加毒素积累，生命只能通过毒伤恢复。
mementos.effect_en: Healing increases poison buildup, and health can only be recovered by poison damage.
mementos.lore_cn: 我久浸于这病态甜香，如今维系生命只需一场永恒顽疾。
mementos.lore_en: I spent so long breathing these sickly sweet perfumes that now all I need to sustain myself is an everlasting illness.
mementos.note: 仅限医生使用；开局携带此物品。

mementos.effect_cn: 饥饿对我的负面影响延缓生效。
mementos.effect_en: It takes longer for my hunger to have any debilitating effects on my performance.
mementos.lore_cn: 感觉能饱腹数日。
mementos.lore_en: I feel like I will be full for days.

mementos.effect_cn: 获取经验有助于缓解饥饿。
mementos.effect_en: Gaining experience will help satiate my hunger.
mementos.lore_cn: 若记不全食材，今夜便无饭可食。
mementos.lore_en: We won't eat tonight unless I can remember all the ingredients.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的饥饿更易满足。
mementos.effect_en: My hunger is satiated easier.
mementos.lore_cn: 我不后悔多添一份。
mementos.lore_en: I don't regret the extra helping.
mementos.note: 吃东西的效果增强。

mementos.effect_cn: 饥饿稍快袭来，但击杀敌人可暂缓饥饿。
mementos.effect_en: I get hungry a little quicker, but killing an enemy will satisfy me for some time.
mementos.lore_cn: 他们保证这是上等佳酿，但这酒异常粘稠。味道不错。我还想要。
mementos.lore_en: They assure me it's of the highest quality, but the wine is still oddly thick. Tastes good though. I want more.
mementos.note: 历史学家开局携带此物品。

mementos.effect_cn: 雨中我的耐力恢复更快。
mementos.effect_en: I regain my stamina quicker in the rain.
mementos.lore_cn: 我爱雨！能在水坑里玩上几小时！
mementos.lore_en: I love the rain! I could play in these puddles for hours!
mementos.note: 在室内失效

mementos.effect_cn: 燃烧时耐力恢复大幅加快。
mementos.effect_en: My stamina recovers much quickly while I burn.
mementos.lore_cn: 有人以为焚烧我的人偶能削弱身心。纯属胡言。这反让我更强。
mementos.lore_en: Some think burning me in effigy will weaken my body and soul. Complete nonsense of course. It makes me stronger.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的耐力开始更快恢复。
mementos.effect_en: My stamina will begin returning quicker.
mementos.lore_cn: 我无需休息。事实上，我可能永不再休。
mementos.lore_en: I do not need to rest. In fact, I may never rest again.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的耐力恢复加快。
mementos.effect_en: My stamina recovers quicker.
mementos.lore_cn: 必须保持清醒。必须行动。
mementos.lore_en: Need to stay awake. Need to move.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的激增附加火焰伤害。
mementos.effect_en: My surges are augmented to deal fire damage.
mementos.lore_cn: 他们心怀狂怒，血脉燃火而来。
mementos.lore_en: They came with fury in their hearts and fire in their veins.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的能量涌动强化为冰霜伤害​
mementos.effect_en: My surges are augmented to deal ice damage.
mementos.lore_cn: 风暴般的士兵将战争覆盖大地。
mementos.lore_en: A storm of soldiers to blanket the land in war.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的激增范围更大且数量更多。
mementos.effect_en: My surges are larger and more numerous.
mementos.lore_cn: 为国王！为荣耀与尊严！
mementos.lore_en: For the king! For glory and honor!
mementos.note: +1激增容量，+1激增...？

mementos.effect_cn: 大球绕我飞行，撞击敌人并常使其眩晕。
mementos.effect_en: A large ball orbits me wherever I go, knocking into enemies and often stunning them.
mementos.lore_cn: 我恨这游戏！总被砸中脸。
mementos.lore_en: I hate this game! I keep getting hit in the face.

mementos.effect_cn: 微光绕我飞行，驱散黑暗并发现隐藏秘密。
mementos.effect_en: A small light orbits me at a distance, keeping the darkness at bay and discovering hidden secrets.
mementos.lore_cn: 无人能趁我们不备偷袭。
mementos.lore_en: Nothing will catch us unawares.

mementos.effect_cn: 小型锯片环绕角色旋转，伤害敌人。
mementos.effect_en: A small sawblade circles around the character, damaging enemies.
mementos.lore_cn: 呸。不用戴手套，很快就切完。
mementos.lore_en: Bah. I don't need to get the gloves, this'll be a quick cut.
mementos.note: 每次命中造成4点伤害。

mementos.effect_cn: 一名神射手之魂加入我的队伍。
mementos.effect_en: The ghost of a skilled archer joins me as an ally。
mementos.lore_cn: 无名英豪执此神弓，一箭诛天翼神明。
mementos.lore_en: An unknown hero wielding this bow brought down the winged god with a single shot.
mementos.note: 获得一名持弓的隐藏盟友（可被击杀，小心！）

mementos.effect_cn: 受击时召唤守护萤火虫援助。
mementos.effect_en: Getting hit will call a protective firefly to my aid.
mementos.lore_cn: 我们遭袭了！发防御信号！
mementos.lore_en: We are attacked! Signal the defense!

mementos.effect_cn: 盟友蜘蛛将从敌人尸体孵化。
mementos.effect_en: Allied spiders will hatch from corpses of my enemies.
mementos.lore_cn: 它们食尽内脏后破尸而出，漫地横行。
mementos.lore_en: Having fed upon the inside, they hatched from his corpse and poured across the ground.
mementos.note: 击杀敌人时频繁生成友方蜘蛛。部分小型敌人（如血史莱姆）不会触发

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人眩晕时间延长。
mementos.effect_en: My opponents remain stunned longer than normal.
mementos.lore_cn: 发生何事？我在何处？昏迷多久？
mementos.lore_en: What happened? Where am I? How long was I out?
mementos.note: 格挡攻击时同样生效，给你更多反击时间

mementos.effect_cn: 受伤的敌人更易遭受暴击。
mementos.effect_en: Injured enemies are more susceptible to critical hits.
mementos.lore_cn: 对将死之人，精准至关重要。
mementos.lore_en: For the dying, precision is vital.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人更难闪避我的攻击。
mementos.effect_en: My opponents are less likely to dodge my attacks.
mementos.lore_cn: 无论去往何方，人们总'意外'地不给我让路。
mementos.lore_en: Wherever I go, people "accidentally" fail to move out of my way.

mementos.effect_cn: 被眩晕的敌人会受到更多伤害。
mementos.effect_en: Stunned enemies take more damage.
mementos.lore_cn: 有人称之为作弊。那些人死到临头犹不自知。
mementos.lore_en: Some people call it cheating. Those people missed their own deaths.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人尸体可能爆炸。
mementos.effect_en: The bodies of fallen enemies may explode.
mementos.lore_cn: 尸体……爆炸了。只余灰烬。
mementos.lore_en: The corpse... exploded. Naught was left but ash.
mementos.note: 尸体会在数秒内缓慢膨胀然后爆炸。可能伤及自身

mementos.effect_cn: 附近的敌人逐渐冻结。
mementos.effect_en: Nearby enemies slowly freeze.
mementos.lore_cn: 该死的风暴。几乎看不见眼前的双手。太冷了……也许该在此歇息片刻。
mementos.lore_en: Damn this storm. I can barely see my hands before my eyes. It is so cold... Maybe I will rest here for a moment.

mementos.effect_cn: 周围敌人越多我越强大。
mementos.effect_en: I grow stronger with every nearby enemy.
mementos.lore_cn: 我喜爱之人，一拳可数。
mementos.lore_en: I can count the number of people I like on one fist.

mementos.effect_cn: 触碰我的敌人很快就会发现自己及其盟友都死于瘟疫。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies who touch me will soon find themselves and their allies dying of the plague.
mementos.lore_cn: 疾病无尽蔓延，终将倾覆帝国。
mementos.lore_en: The sickness spread everlasting, eventually toppling an empire.
mementos.note: 触碰敌人会使其中毒。

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人可能会逃离我的攻击。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies may flee from my attacks.
mementos.lore_cn: 它……本不该存于世！
mementos.lore_en: It... it should not be!

mementos.effect_cn: 当我们的目光相遇时，我的对手移动速度会变慢。
mementos.effect_en: My opponents move slower when our eyes meet.
mementos.lore_cn: 别看！否则你将永世沉沦。
mementos.lore_en: Do not look! Do not look or you may never look away.

mementos.effect_cn: 逃跑的敌人可能会选择加入我而非赴死。
mementos.effect_en: Fleeing enemies may choose to join me instead of dying.
mementos.lore_cn: 与其在异国战场腐烂，不如被标为叛徒——我将此烙印视作智慧的象征。
mementos.lore_en: Better to be marked a turncoat than rot on some foreign battlefield. I wear my new brand as a symbol of wisdom.
mementos.note: 击中敌人可能使其叛变

mementos.effect_cn: 我的武器更大。
mementos.effect_en: My weapons are larger.
mementos.lore_cn: 其武器大如成人。我们毫无胜算。
mementos.lore_en: Its weapon was the size of a grown man. We had no chance.
mementos.note: 增加攻击范围，且不改变挥动速度。

mementos.effect_cn: 我能更快挥动武器。
mementos.effect_en: I can swing my weapons faster.
mementos.lore_cn: 看我挥得多快！
mementos.lore_en: Look how fast I can swing it!
mementos.note: 获得+10%敏捷。

mementos.effect_cn: 强力武器造成更高伤害。
mementos.effect_en: More powerful weapons will deal increased damage.
mementos.lore_cn: 只要挥得够狠，万物皆可伤人。
mementos.lore_en: Anything can hurt if it's swung hard enough.

mementos.effect_cn: 一个幽灵的武器与我的武器同步攻击。
mementos.effect_en: A ghostly weapon attacks in sync with my own.
mementos.lore_cn: 这缥缈刀刃是我亲手锻造，还是某位玄奥幽灵的干预？
mementos.lore_en: Is this ethereal blade of my own making or the intervention of some enigmatic spirit?
mementos.note: 获得一柄幽灵之刃，与你的武器同步攻击（即双刃同时挥动）

mementos.effect_cn: 我将敌人和物体推得更远。
mementos.effect_en: I push enemies and objects further.
mementos.lore_cn: 货物散落了！浪袭时小心滑动的箱子！
mementos.lore_en: The cargo has broken loose! Watch out for sliding boxes when a wave hits!

mementos.effect_cn: 攻击期间移动加速。
mementos.effect_en: I move quicker while attacking.
mementos.lore_cn: 我在园中耗费数时，精练步法。
mementos.lore_en: I spent hours in the garden practicing my footwork.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人被击退时，其冲力会撞伤撞到的盟友。
mementos.effect_en: When an opponent is pushed back by my attacks, their momentum will injure any ally they knock into.
mementos.lore_cn: 只需放此一处，陷阱即成！看他们摔得淤青时还如何嘲笑我！
mementos.lore_en: I need only to lay this here and the trap is set! Let us see how well they can mock me while they lie bruised upon the floor!

mementos.effect_cn: 增加我的暴击几率。
mementos.effect_en: This increases my chance to land critical hits.
mementos.lore_cn: 野兽缺乏精准。敏锐之眼方为非凡人类的标志。
mementos.lore_en: Beasts lack precision. A deft eye is the mark of an exceptional human.

mementos.effect_cn: 对生命低于一半的敌人造成显著额外伤害。
mementos.effect_en: I deal considerably more damage to enemies who are over halfway to death
mementos.lore_cn: 何时落下？望速速了结。
mementos.lore_en: When is it coming? I wish they would hurry up and end it.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次攻击敌人会流出更多血液。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies will spill more blood with every hit.
mementos.lore_cn: 此处之血远多于我所需。
mementos.lore_en: There is more blood here than I could ever need.
mementos.note: 与依赖血液的纪念品（如'红酒？'）协同增效，并辅助仪式。邪教徒初始携带此道具。

mementos.effect_cn: 成功攻击可额外恢复少量耐力。
mementos.effect_en: Successful attacks will allow me to regain a little extra stamina.
mementos.lore_cn: 虔诚孕育狂热。
mementos.lore_en: Piety breeds fervor.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人在攻击期间更易受伤。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies will injure easier if hit during their attack.
mementos.lore_cn: 我们将在敌人冲锋时进攻。攻势中他们无法自卫。
mementos.lore_en: We will attack during the enemy's charge. They cannot hope to defend themselves while on the offensive.

mementos.effect_cn: 生命流逝时我挥动更快。
mementos.effect_en: I swing faster while my health is depleting.
mementos.lore_cn: 必须尽快，她情况恶化。
mementos.lore_en: We must work quickly, her condition is worsening.

mementos.effect_cn: 立于血泊时，我移动攻击更快。
mementos.effect_en: I move and attack quicker whilst standing upon blood.
mementos.lore_cn: 我浴其血而化，成非凡人之物。
mementos.lore_en: I bathed in his blood and became something greater than human.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次击杀增加我的耐力。
mementos.effect_en: Every kill increases my stamina.
mementos.lore_cn: 杀戮狂热自我滋养，生而为杀者获赐无尽能量。
mementos.lore_en: The zeal of slaughter feeds upon itself and those who live to kill are blessed with boundless energy.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次成功命中增加攻击性，未命中则降低。
mementos.effect_en: My aggression increases with every successful hit but decreases when I miss.
mementos.lore_cn: 不训者必败于勤训者之手。
mementos.lore_en: He who does not train is doomed to be bested by he who does.

mementos.effect_cn: 攻击可愈命脉之竭。
mementos.effect_en: Attacks will recover my depleting health.
mementos.lore_cn: 非人者亘古长存。
mementos.lore_en: Inhumanity will outlast us all.
mementos.note: 恢复尚未消逝的生命值（黄色生命值）。

mementos.effect_cn: 暴击会伤害对手周围的所有人。
mementos.effect_en: Critical hits hurt all those around my opponent.
mementos.lore_cn: 他锤击地裂之猛烈，连附近未触石像也轰然倒地。
mementos.lore_en: He rent the ground with such ferocity that even nearby statues untouched by his hammer toppled to the ground.

mementos.effect_cn: 我的攻击可能点燃敌人。
mementos.effect_en: My attacks may set enemies on fire.
mementos.lore_cn: 他仍在其中燃烧。
mementos.lore_en: He's still inside, burning.

mementos.effect_cn: 挥砍多个敌人时，武器所受惩罚减轻。
mementos.effect_en: My weapons receive less of penalty when cleaving through multiple enemies during a swing.
mementos.lore_cn: 为何我裤子在那边？谁的双腿在里面？我盾牌另一半去哪了？
mementos.lore_en: Why are my trousers way over there and whose legs are in them? Where did the other side of my shield go?

mementos.effect_cn: 每次成功攻击恢复生命。
mementos.effect_en: Every successful attack will restore my health.
mementos.lore_cn: 每道伤口都让她返老还童，愈后无痕。我死时凝视着一个孩童。
mementos.lore_en: With every cut she seemed to age in reverse and her wounds healed without scars. I died staring at a child.

mementos.effect_cn: 攻击有小概率刷新激增充能。
mementos.effect_en: Attacks have a small chance to refresh Surge charges.
mementos.lore_cn: 信仰使然，每次挥击皆如最后一击。
mementos.lore_en: Such is my faith that every blow strikes as if it's my last.
mementos.note: 每携带一枚增加1%触发概率。

mementos.effect_cn: ​​我可处决濒死之敌。
mementos.effect_en: I may execute a dying enemy.
mementos.lore_cn: 斩立决以终结其苦痛。
mementos.lore_en: A swift execution to end their pain.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次击杀增加生命。
mementos.effect_en: Every kill increases my health.
mementos.lore_cn: 他们能永生。所需不过鲜血。
mementos.lore_en: They can live forever. All they need is blood.
mementos.note: 当有人死亡时，增加0.5点最大生命值。

mementos.effect_cn: 成功格挡对手的攻击将强化我下次挥砍的威力。
mementos.effect_en: Successfully blocking an opponent's attack increases the power of my next swing.
mementos.lore_cn: 举盾格挡。他们的冲力即成你的武器。
mementos.lore_en: Dig in and take it on your shield. Their momentum is now your weapon.

mementos.effect_cn: 成功躲避对手的攻击会增加我下一次挥击的速度
mementos.effect_en: Successfully dodging an opponent's attack increases the speed of my next swing.
mementos.lore_cn: 我乃优雅之典范。
mementos.lore_en: I am the epitome of grace.

mementos.effect_cn: 成功格挡攻击将强化下次挥击伤害。
mementos.effect_en: Successfully parrying an opponent's attack increases the damage of my next swing.
mementos.lore_cn: 精妙反击可化百炼钢为绕指柔。
mementos.lore_en: The riposte, if performed correctly, will be vastly more effective than brute force.

mementos.effect_cn: 攻击期间受击产生冲击波击退敌人。
mementos.effect_en: Getting hit during my attack creates a shockwave to push back enemies.
mementos.lore_cn: 别打断我！
mementos.lore_en: Stop interrupting me!

mementos.effect_cn: 伤害触碰到的敌人。
mementos.effect_en: I hurt any enemy I touch.
mementos.lore_cn: 喝酒勿扰!
mementos.lore_en: Do not touch me while I'm drinking.
mementos.note: 对接触到的敌人造成2点伤害（包括格挡时，至少在使用盾牌格挡的情况下）。

mementos.effect_cn: 受击可能获得少量护甲。
mementos.effect_en: Getting hit may grant me a small amount of armor.
mementos.lore_cn: 我的钢铁救星。
mementos.lore_en: My steel savior.
mementos.note: 此外，格挡时会使盾牌流血，非常适合血祭仪式。

mementos.effect_cn: 触碰我的敌人将突感寒意。
mementos.effect_en: Any enemy who touches me will striken with a sudden chill.
mementos.lore_cn: 吾王残躯冻于囹圄，无人敢近。
mementos.lore_en: What remains of my king stands frozen in his prison, and none dare go near.

mementos.effect_cn: 受击可能使我狂暴。
mementos.effect_en: Getting hit may cause me to go berserk.
mementos.lore_cn: 我恨你胜过恨己。试试看。
mementos.lore_en: I hate you even more than I hate myself. Try me.

mementos.effect_cn: 我溅洒的鲜血会灼烧踏足其上的敌人。
mementos.effect_en: My spilt blood burns those who step upon it.
mementos.lore_cn: 据说他们血脉燃火。且看是否属实。
mementos.lore_en: They are said to have fire in their veins. Let us see if that is true.
mementos.note: 被击中时流落橙红色血泊，对踏入其中的敌人造成伤害。

mementos.effect_cn: 流血时我显著更危险。
mementos.effect_en: I am considerably more dangerous while bleeding out.
mementos.lore_cn: 你们全跟我走！
mementos.lore_en: You're all coming with me!
mementos.note: 殉道者开局携带此物品。

mementos.effect_cn: 我受到的攻击可能被抵消。
mementos.effect_en: Any hit I take may be negated.
mementos.lore_cn: 我本该死了……箭被幸运币弹开。
mementos.lore_en: I should be dead... The arrow was deflected by my lucky coin.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次受击都会增强我的攻击性。
mementos.effect_en: Every hit I take increases my aggression
mementos.lore_cn: 捍卫汝之荣耀，免受伤害汝者之辱。
mementos.lore_en: Defend thine honor from those who hurt you.

mementos.effect_cn: 每次受击后短暂无敌。
mementos.effect_en: Every time I take a hit, I become invulnerable for a brief moment.
mementos.lore_cn: 每次敲打，它都缩回壳里。蠢龟。
mementos.lore_en: Every time we whack it, it just pops back into its shell. Stupid turtle.

mementos.effect_cn: 我积累经验以充能未施放法术。
mementos.effect_en: I accumulate experience to recharge spells yet cast.
mementos.lore_cn: 学者的武器。
mementos.lore_en: The scholar's weapon.
mementos.note: 可储存1点经验值以过载法术，拾取经验时不会消耗（若无法术充能中）。

mementos.effect_cn: 我的法术更难被粉碎。
mementos.effect_en: My spells are harder to shatter.
mementos.lore_cn: 我亲手所制。这个不会像其他那样裂开。
mementos.lore_en: I made it myself. This one will not crack like the others.

mementos.effect_cn: 施法时脚下魔法阵更大。
mementos.effect_en: The magic circle drawn at my feet when casting spells is larger.
mementos.lore_cn: 我要画最大的圈！还要像爸爸那样加些花哨图案！哇，为何在发光？
mementos.lore_en: I'm gonna draw the biggest circle! And I'll add some fancy designs inside just like dad does! Whoa, why is it glowing?

mementos.effect_cn: 云下施法将召唤闪电劈地。
mementos.effect_en: Casting spells beneath a cloud will call a lightning bolt to strike the ground.
mementos.lore_cn: 同侪赠此物，嘱我施法时高举。
mementos.lore_en: My peers gave this to me to hold aloft whenever I practice my spellcasting.

mementos.effect_cn: 施法后法术可能立即充能完毕。
mementos.effect_en: A spell may recharge immediately after being cast.
mementos.lore_cn: 据说能将法术存于其中。这次或许不必久等。
mementos.lore_en: They said I could store a spell in one of these. Maybe I won't have to wait so long this time.
mementos.note: 每次施法都有10%的几率使法术立即充能完毕。

mementos.effect_cn: 法术破裂或震颤时释放魔法爆发。
mementos.effect_en: A magical burst is unleashed when my spells crack or chatter.
mementos.lore_cn: 你定要……万分小心……别弄裂它。
mementos.lore_en: You must... be very careful... not to crack it.

mementos.effect_cn: 我将自动接收并识别未知药水。
mementos.effect_en: I automatically receive and identify an unknown potion.
mementos.lore_cn: 瓶中何物？
mementos.lore_en: What's in here?
mementos.note: 随机识别一种药水。化学家开局自带3个。

mementos.effect_cn: 钥匙使用后可能不会消失。
mementos.effect_en: There is a chance that keys will not be lost upon use.
mementos.lore_cn: 它起效了……但它真的存在过吗？
mementos.lore_en: It worked... But was it ever really there?

mementos.effect_cn: 拿起金属物体会导致触电。
mementos.effect_en: Picking up metal objects will cause a electric shock.
mementos.lore_cn: 真见鬼！这破铁疙瘩天天漏电电我！。
mementos.lore_en: Dammit! This stupid piece of metal shocks me every time.
mementos.note: 捡起护甲、钥匙和金属条会触发一道微弱的闪电，伤害周围的敌人

mementos.effect_cn: 捡起金属物体会让我短暂漂浮。
mementos.effect_en: Picking up metal objects will cause me to float for a brief time.
mementos.lore_cn: 快完工了！只需再找点金属。
mementos.lore_en: Almost finished! Only need to find a little more metal.
mementos.note: 拾取金属会使你飞行？

mementos.effect_cn: 破坏板条箱和木桶会生成果蝇援助。
mementos.effect_en: Destroying crates and barrels will spawn fruit flies to aid me.
mementos.lore_cn: 这箱肉全腐坏了。只有苍蝇。恶心。
mementos.lore_en: This crate is completely spoiled. Only flies in here. Disgusting.

mementos.effect_cn: 破坏板条箱和木桶可能获得经验。
mementos.effect_en: Crates and barrels may carry experience.
mementos.lore_cn: 别傻站着，伙计！砸开看看里面藏着什么奥秘。
mementos.lore_en: Well don't just stand there, man! Break it open and let us see what mysteries lie within.
mementos.note: 板条箱和木桶通常（总是？）包含经验值。

mementos.effect_cn: 破坏板条箱和木桶可能发现有用物资。
mementos.effect_en: Crates and barrels may reveal useful supplies when destroyed.
mementos.lore_cn: 只要足够仔细，宝藏俯拾即是。
mementos.lore_en: So many treasures to find if only one looks closely enough.

mementos.effect_cn: 人类可能掉落生肉。
mementos.effect_en: Humans have a chance to drop raw meat.
mementos.lore_cn: 肉即是肉。
mementos.lore_en: Meat is meat.

mementos.effect_cn: 石制物品被摧毁时可能掉落金属。
mementos.effect_en: Objects made of stone may drop metal when destroyed.
mementos.lore_cn: 敲石碎矿，熔炼不断。
mementos.lore_en: Break the stone. Smelt the ore. Break the stone. Smelt the ore.
mementos.note: 破坏岩石或水晶尖刺可能掉落金属

mementos.effect_cn: 水中移动更快。
mementos.effect_en: I move faster in water.
mementos.lore_cn: 无桨何必入水？
mementos.lore_en: Why even get in the water without one?

mementos.effect_cn: 探索周围世界时，发现更多区域可能获得经验。
mementos.effect_en: There is a chance for me to gain experience whenever I discover more of the world around me.
mementos.lore_cn: 想想探索时将有的一切奇妙经历！
mementos.lore_en: Think of all the amazing experiences I will have while exploring!

mementos.effect_cn: 提升宝箱掉落物品品质。
mementos.effect_en: Improves the quality of items dropped from chests.
mementos.lore_cn: 这般锁具，内藏之物定非凡品。
mementos.lore_en: With a lock like that, whatever is inside must be good.

mementos.effect_cn: 探索新区域时总能找到藏宝图。
mementos.effect_en: I can always find a treasure map when I venture to a new area.
mementos.lore_cn: 甚怪……每次展开都现新地图。
mementos.lore_en: Very odd... Each time I unfurl it a new map is drawn.
mementos.note: 进入新区域时自动获得一张藏宝图（首次拾取不触发）。探索者角色初始携带此道具。

mementos.effect_cn: 不动的时候，时间流动变慢。
mementos.effect_en: Time slows when I am not moving.
mementos.lore_cn: 机枢渐滞。
mementos.lore_en: It keeps slowing down.
mementos.note: 站立不动时减缓时间流动。

mementos.effect_cn: 潜行攻击时我更危险。
mementos.effect_en: I am more dangerous when attacking from stealth.
mementos.lore_cn: 肩胛间突感暖意。最后所见是女儿所制蜡烛。
mementos.lore_en: There was a sudden warmth between my shoulders. The last thing I saw was the candle my daughter created.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人需更靠近才能察觉我。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies will need to get closer to notice me.
mementos.lore_cn: 只是个穿普通斗篷的普通人，何必在意
mementos.lore_en: Just an ordinary guy in an ordinary cloak. No need to pay me any mind.
mementos.note: 若完成'幽灵'成就，厌世者开局携带此物品。

mementos.effect_cn: 夜晚我造成更高伤害。
mementos.effect_en: I deal increased damage during the night.
mementos.lore_cn: 日落时真我显现，夜行动物不似人类踌躇。
mementos.lore_en: As the sun sets my true self is revealed, and animals of the night have not the reservations of men.

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人发现我时可能隐形。
mementos.effect_en: I may turn invisible when an enemy spots me.
mementos.lore_cn: 父亲盛怒。不知何故，但我需躲藏。
mementos.lore_en: Father is angry. I don't know what I did but I need to hide.

mementos.effect_cn: 当敌人攻击我时，我可能会隐形。
mementos.effect_en: I may turn invisible when an enemy hits me.
mementos.lore_cn: 我需即刻藏身。
mementos.lore_en: I need to hide right now.
mementos.note: 受到攻击时有较高几率进入隐形状态。

mementos.effect_cn: 爆炸范围更大。
mementos.effect_en: Explosions are bigger than ever.
mementos.lore_cn: 只需加热然后——
mementos.lore_en: Just apply heat and-

mementos.effect_cn: 陷阱触发后延迟生效。
mementos.effect_en: Traps take longer to go off after being triggered.
mementos.lore_cn: 喏，问题在此。陷阱都快锈穿了！难怪反应迟钝。
mementos.lore_en: Well there is yer problem. The trap is near rusted through! No wonder it reacts slowly.

mementos.effect_cn: 用经验购买物品可能获部分退款。
mementos.effect_en: Purchases I make using experience may be partially refunded.
mementos.lore_cn: 天呐，似乎误对我有利。真走运！
mementos.lore_en: My word, there appears to have been an error in my favor. How lucky!

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人死亡时逸散的经验会伤及他人。
mementos.effect_en: The experience expelled from dying enemies will injure others.
mementos.lore_cn: 他的死忆犹痛。切肤之痛。
mementos.lore_en: The memory of his death is still painful. Physically painful.
mementos.note: 每携带一件纪念品，对敌人造成1点伤害。

mementos.effect_cn: 敌人死亡时放弃更多经验。
mementos.effect_en: Enemies will relinquish more experience when they die.
mementos.lore_cn: 他人经历影响我们看待世界的方式。
mementos.lore_en: The experiences of others influence how we view the world.
